about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Gujarat based Parin Furniture Limited is a company engaged in the business of providing provider of a wide and exclusive range of furniture and lifestyle products. The product portfolio of the company includes a variety of furniture for homes, offices, hospitals and other institutions.

The company's business network is spread in 18 States with COCO Flagship Retail Stores in Ahmedabad, Rajkot, and Mumbai. Around 900 dealers associated with it. It has 4 warehouses in Rajkot, Surat, Mumbai, and Kolkata.

Parin Furniture has also entered into franchise agreements with other companies in Junagadh, Mehsana, and Hyderabad.

Its Subsidiary Company 'Pearl Furniture Private Limited' has a well-established manufacturing unit located at Rajkot. The facility is equipped with high tech equipment and design facility to manufacture various all types of furniture.

The company has 137 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Parin Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer:
Parin Furniture IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹63 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 26, 2018, and closes on September 28, 2018.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Parin Furniture IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Parin Furniture IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Parin Furniture IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Parin Furniture IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Parin Furniture IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Parin Furniture IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Parin Furniture IPO opens on September 26, 2018 and closes on September 28, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Parin Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer: Parin Furniture IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Parin Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Parin Furniture IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Parin Furniture IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Parin Furniture IPO will be done on Thursday, October 4, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, October 5, 2018. Check the Parin Furniture IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Parin Furniture IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Parin Furniture IPO listing date is on Tuesday, October 9, 2018.
